issues.shortMessage: Remove the exception throwing from this property getter, or refactor the property into a method.
issues.fullMessage: Property getters should be simple operations that are always safe to call. If exceptions need to be thrown, it is best to convert the property to a method.

properties.title: Exceptions should not be thrown from property getters
